ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Charm to be fixed again
ygData.msgSnippet: They are looking at it.  Gordon responed to my post on the refresh issues last week. Rokenn
ygData.messageBody:
They are looking at it. Gordon responed to my post on the refresh issues
last week.

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Adam Wasserman [mailto:wassermana@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, April 26, 2000 8:12 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Charm to be fixed again
>
>
> This in from Abashi yesterday...
>
> --------------------------------------------------------------
> --------------
> -------------
> Thanks for bringing this back up front. I was looking for it earlier.
>
> Yes, it appears that we introduced a bug last week that capped a bards
> attempts to charm at their level. This unintentionally
> affected the lower
> level charm song as well as the upper level. We'll be fixing
> this when we
> patch spells next. No other charm spells were affected.
>
> -Gordon
> posted 04-25-2000 10:49 PM
> --------------------------------------------------------------
> --------------
> -------------
>
> Now, if only we could get them to look at the inability to
> refresh charm
> till it's worn off.
>
> Draelon
>
>
